For those looking to dress down

Normal: You see Archsenex Vagor. He appears to be a Dark Elf. He is average height. He appears to be as old as the hills. He has piercing milky white eyes and dark skin. He has very long, tied back blue-black hair with a white streak running through it. He has a gaunt face, a thin nose and sunken cheeks.

With Mud in Hair You see Archsenex Vagor. He appears to be a Dark Elf. He is average height. He appears to be as old as the hills. He has piercing milky white eyes and dark skin. He has very long, tied back blue-black hair that hangs in lank clumps about his face and is matted with mottled red mud. He has a gaunt face, a thin nose and sunken cheeks.

Curious what it's worth, and taking reasonable offers
